title: Jimmy Butler takes down Celtics in game 1
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss game 1 of the Eastern Conference Finals. Jimmy Butler’s big game propelled the Miami Heat to the home victory over the Boston Celtics. Find out if the Heat can continue this success for the whole series. Plus, did you see what Tyler Herro wore at the press conference? The guys tell you that they are all for the postgame fit. Plus, Detroit Pistons fall to number 5 in the NBA Draft. Find out if Jalen is upset with the fall or if he’s thinking playoffs next season. Also, Luka vs Steph in Game 1 tonight. Find out who has the edge for the superstars and if they will have the edge in the series as well. All that and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
